segments.source_content:
---
title: How to Open a Pull Request
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: These instructions provide the step-by-step process to set up your machine to make contributions to the core React Native repository, and create your first pull request.

translations.zh-hant: 這些指示提供了逐步流程，幫助您設定機器以貢獻核心 React Native 儲存庫，並建立您的第一個拉取請求。

segments.source_content: ## Prologue: Getting Ready

translations.zh-hant: ## 序章：準備工作

segments.source_content: You will need a few tools and dependencies in order to build and develop for React Native. These are covered as part of the [Environment Setup](/docs/environment-setup) guide under the "Building Projects with Native Code" section.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要一些工具和依賴項才能建置和開發 React Native。這些內容涵蓋在[環境設定](/docs/environment-setup)指南的「使用原生程式碼建置專案」部分中。

segments.source_content: In order to accept your pull request, we need you to submit a [Contributor License Agreement (CLA)](/contributing/contribution-license-agreement). You only need to do this once to work on any of Meta's open source projects. It only takes a minute, so you can do it while you wait for your dependencies to install.

translations.zh-hant: 為了接受您的拉取請求，我們需要您提交[貢獻者授權協議 (CLA)](/contributing/contribution-license-agreement)。您只需執行一次此操作，即可參與 Meta 的任何開源專案。只需一分鐘即可完成，因此您可以在等待依賴項安裝時進行。

segments.source_content: ## Chapter I: Welcome to Open Source

translations.zh-hant: ## 第一章：歡迎來到開源世界

segments.source_content: ### 1. Install `git`

translations.zh-hant: ### 1. 安裝 `git`

segments.source_content: The React Native source code is hosted on GitHub. You can interact with the git version control through the `git` command line program. We recommend you follow [GitHub's instructions](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git/) to set up git on your machine.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 的原始碼託管在 GitHub 上。您可以透過 `git` 命令列程式與 git 版本控制互動。我們建議您遵循 [GitHub 的指示](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git/)在您的機器上設定 git。

segments.source_content: ### 2. Get the source code

translations.zh-hant: ### 2. 取得原始碼

segments.source_content: While you can browse the source code for React Native on [GitHub](https://github.com/facebook/react-native), we recommend you set up a fork on your local machine.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以在 [GitHub](https://github.com/facebook/react-native) 上瀏覽 React Native 的原始碼，但我們建議您在本地機器上設定一個分叉。

segments.source_content:
1. Go to https://github.com/facebook/react-native.
2. Click on "Fork" button on the upper right.
3. When asked, select your username as the host for this fork.

translations.zh-hant:
1. Go to https://github.com/facebook/react-native.
2. Click on "Fork" button on the upper right.
3. When asked, select your username as the host for this fork.

segments.source_content: You will now have a fork of React Native on GitHub at https://github.com/your_username/react-native. Next, you will grab a copy of the source code for your local machine. Open a shell and type the following commands:

translations.zh-hant: You will now have a fork of React Native on GitHub at https://github.com/your_username/react-native. Next, you will grab a copy of the source code for your local machine. Open a shell and type the following commands:

segments.source_content:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/facebook/react-native.git
cd react-native
git remote add fork https://github.com/your_username/react-native.git
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0c911872

segments.source_content:
:::note
If the above seems new to you, do not be scared. You can access a shell through the Terminal application on macOS and Linux, or PowerShell on Windows.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
如果上述內容對您來說是新知識，請不要害怕。您可以透過 macOS 和 Linux 上的 Terminal 應用程式或 Windows 上的 PowerShell 存取 shell。
:::

segments.source_content: A new `react-native` directory will be created with the contents of the core React Native repository. This directory is actually a clone of the React Native git repository. It is set up with two remotes:

translations.zh-hant: 將建立一個新的 `react-native` 目錄，其中包含核心 React Native 儲存庫的內容。此目錄實際上是 React Native git 儲存庫的克隆。它設定了兩個遠端：

segments.source_content:
- `origin` for the upstream https://github.com/facebook/react-native repository
- `fork` for the fork of React Native on your own GitHub account.

translations.zh-hant:
- `origin` 用於上游的 https://github.com/facebook/react-native 儲存庫
- `fork` 用於您自己 GitHub 帳戶上的 React Native 分叉。

segments.source_content: ### 3. Create a branch

translations.zh-hant: ### 3. 建立分支

segments.source_content: We recommend creating a new branch in your fork to keep track of your changes:

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議在您的分叉中建立一個新分支以追蹤您的變更：

segments.source_content:
```bash
git checkout --branch my_feature_branch --track origin/main
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_48ec8149

segments.source_content: ## Chapter II: Implementing your Changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 第二章：實作您的變更

segments.source_content: ### 1. Install dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ### 1. 安裝依賴項

segments.source_content: React Native is a JavaScript monorepo managed by [Yarn Workspaces (Yarn Classic)](https://classic.yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/workspaces/).

translations.zh-hant: React Native 是一個由 [Yarn Workspaces (Yarn Classic)](https://classic.yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/workspaces/) 管理的 JavaScript 單一儲存庫。

segments.source_content: Run a project-level install:

translations.zh-hant: 執行專案層級的安裝：

segments.source_content:
```sh
yarn
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3c08ed05

segments.source_content: You will also need to build the `react-native-codegen` package once:

translations.zh-hant: 您還需要建置 `react-native-codegen` 套件一次：

segments.source_content:
```sh
yarn --cwd packages/react-native-codegen build
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5d4925eb

segments.source_content: ### 2. Make changes to the code

translations.zh-hant: ### 2. 修改程式碼

segments.source_content: You can now open the project using your code editor of choice. [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) is popular with JavaScript developers, and recommended if you are making general changes to React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 您現在可以使用您選擇的程式碼編輯器開啟專案。[Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) 在 JavaScript 開發者中很受歡迎，如果您正在對 React Native 進行一般變更，我們推薦使用它。

segments.source_content: IDE project configurations:

translations.zh-hant: IDE 專案設定：

segments.source_content:
- **VS Code**: Open the `react-native.code-workspace` file. This should open with extension recommendations, and configure the Flow Language Service and other editor settings correctly.
- **Android Studio**: Open the repo root folder (containing the `.idea` config directory).
- **Xcode**: Open `packages/rn-tester/RNTesterPods.xcworkspace`.

translations.zh-hant:
- **VS Code**：開啟 `react-native.code-workspace` 檔案。這應該會開啟並推薦擴充功能，並正確設定 Flow 語言服務和其他編輯器設定。
- **Android Studio**：開啟儲存庫根目錄（包含 `.idea` 設定目錄）。
- **Xcode**：開啟 `packages/rn-tester/RNTesterPods.xcworkspace`。

segments.source_content: ### 3. Run your changes

translations.zh-hant: ### 3. 執行您的變更

segments.source_content: The package rn-tester can be used to run and validate your changes. You can learn more in [RNTester readme](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/README.md).

translations.zh-hant: 套件 rn-tester 可用於執行並驗證您的變更。您可以在 [RNTester 說明文件](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/README.md) 中了解更多資訊。

segments.source_content: ### 4. Test your changes

translations.zh-hant: ### 4. 測試您的變更

segments.source_content: Make sure your changes are correct and do not introduce any test failures. You can learn more in [Running and Writing Tests](/contributing/how-to-run-and-write-tests).

translations.zh-hant: 請確保您的變更是正確的，且不會引入任何測試失敗。您可以在 [執行與撰寫測試](/contributing/how-to-run-and-write-tests) 中了解更多資訊。

segments.source_content: ### 5. Lint your code

translations.zh-hant: ### 5. 檢查程式碼風格

segments.source_content: We understand it can take a while to ramp up and get a sense of the style followed for each of the languages in use in the core React Native repository. Developers should not need to worry about minor nits, so whenever possible, we use tools that automate the process of rewriting your code to follow conventions.

translations.zh-hant: 我們理解需要一些時間才能熟悉核心 React Native 儲存庫中每種語言所遵循的風格。開發者不應擔心細微的風格問題，因此我們盡可能使用工具來自動化重寫程式碼以符合慣例的流程。

segments.source_content: For example, we use [Prettier](https://prettier.io/) to format our JavaScript code. This saves you time and energy as you can let Prettier fix up any formatting issues automatically through its editor integrations, or by manually running `yarn run prettier`.

translations.zh-hant: 例如，我們使用 [Prettier](https://prettier.io/) 來格式化 JavaScript 程式碼。這可以節省您的時間和精力，因為您可以透過其編輯器整合讓 Prettier 自動修復任何格式問題，或手動執行 `yarn run prettier`。

segments.source_content: We also use a linter to catch styling issues that may exist in your code. You can check the status of your code styling by running `yarn run lint`.

translations.zh-hant: 我們還使用 linter 來捕捉程式碼中可能存在的風格問題。您可以執行 `yarn run lint` 來檢查程式碼風格的狀態。

segments.source_content: To learn more about coding conventions, refer to the [Coding Style guide](/contributing/how-to-contribute-code#coding-style).

translations.zh-hant: 要了解更多關於編碼慣例的資訊，請參考 [編碼風格指南](/contributing/how-to-contribute-code#coding-style)。

segments.source_content: ### 6. View your changes

translations.zh-hant: ### 6. 檢視您的變更

segments.source_content: Many popular editors integrate with source control in some way. You can also use `git status` and `git diff` on the command line to keep track of what has changed.

translations.zh-hant: 許多流行的編輯器以某種方式整合了版本控制。您也可以在命令列使用 `git status` 和 `git diff` 來追蹤已變更的內容。

segments.source_content: ## Chapter III: Proposing your Changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 第三章：提交您的變更

segments.source_content: ### 1. Commit your changes

translations.zh-hant: ### 1. 提交您的變更

segments.source_content: Make sure to add your changes to version control using `git`:

translations.zh-hant: 請確保使用 `git` 將您的變更加入版本控制：

segments.source_content:
```bash
git add <filename>
git commit -m <message>
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c4c0fc07

segments.source_content: You can use a short descriptive sentence as your commit message.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以使用簡短的描述性句子作為提交訊息。

segments.source_content:
:::note
Worried about writing good git commit messages? Do not fret. Later, when your pull request is merged, all your commits will be squashed into a single commit. It is your pull request description which will be used to populate the message for this squashed commit.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
擔心寫不好 git 提交訊息？別擔心。當您的拉取請求被合併時，所有提交將被壓縮成單一提交。拉取請求的描述將用於填充此壓縮提交的訊息。
:::

segments.source_content: This guide covers enough information to help you along with your first contribution. GitHub has several resources to help you get started with git:

translations.zh-hant: 本指南涵蓋了足夠的資訊來協助您完成首次貢獻。GitHub 提供了多種資源幫助您開始使用 git：

segments.source_content:
- [Using Git](https://help.github.com/en/categories/using-git)
- [The GitHub Flow](https://guides.github.com/introduction/flow/)

translations.zh-hant:
- [使用 Git](https://help.github.com/en/categories/using-git)
- [GitHub 流程](https://guides.github.com/introduction/flow/)

segments.source_content: ### 2. Push your changes to GitHub

translations.zh-hant: ### 2. 將變更推送至 GitHub

segments.source_content: Once your changes have been commited to version control, you can push them to GitHub.

translations.zh-hant: 一旦您的變更已提交至版本控制，您可以將其推送至 GitHub。

segments.source_content:
```bash
git push fork <my_feature_branch>
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1ae0b80d

segments.source_content: If all goes well, you will see a message encouraging you to open a pull request:

translations.zh-hant: 如果一切順利，您將看到一條鼓勵您開啟拉取請求的訊息：

segments.source_content:
```
remote:
remote: Create a pull request for 'your_feature_branch' on GitHub by visiting:
remote:      https://github.com/your_username/react-native/pull/new/your_feature_branch
remote:
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_136818ce

segments.source_content: Visit the provided URL to proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 訪問提供的 URL 以進行下一步。

segments.source_content: ### 3. Create your pull request

translations.zh-hant: ### 3. 建立您的拉取請求

segments.source_content: You are almost there! The next step is to fill out the pull request. Use a descriptive title that is not too long. Then, make sure to fill out all of the fields provided by the default pull request template:

translations.zh-hant: 您快完成了！下一步是填寫拉取請求。使用一個描述性且不太長的標題。然後，確保填寫拉取請求範本提供的所有欄位：

segments.source_content:
- **Summary:** Use this field to provide your motivation for sending this pull request. What are you fixing?
- **[Changelog](/contributing/changelogs-in-pull-requests):** Help release maintainers write release notes by providing a short description of what will be changed should the pull request get merged.
- **Test Plan:** Let reviewers know how you tested your changes. Did you consider any edge cases? Which steps did you follow to make sure your changes have the desired effect? See [What is a Test Plan?](https://medium.com/@martinkonicek/what-is-a-test-plan-8bfc840ec171) to learn more.

translations.zh-hant:
- **摘要：** 使用此欄位說明您發送此拉取請求的動機。您要修復什麼？
- **[變更日誌](/contributing/changelogs-in-pull-requests)：** 透過提供簡短描述，幫助發布維護者在拉取請求被合併時撰寫發布說明。
- **測試計畫：** 讓審查者知道您如何測試變更。您是否考慮了任何邊緣案例？您遵循了哪些步驟來確保變更達到預期效果？請參閱 [什麼是測試計畫？](https://medium.com/@martinkonicek/what-is-a-test-plan-8bfc840ec171) 以了解更多資訊。

segments.source_content: ### 4. Review and address feedback

translations.zh-hant: ### 4. 審查並處理反饋

segments.source_content: Keep an eye on any comments and review feedback left on your pull request on GitHub. Maintainers will do their best to provide constructive, actionable feedback to help get your changes ready to be merged into the core React Native repository.

translations.zh-hant: 請密切關注 GitHub 上針對您的拉取請求所留下的任何評論與審核反饋。維護者們會盡力提供具建設性且可執行的反饋，以協助您的修改準備好被合併至 React Native 核心儲存庫中。
